about_the_game:
Show your support for Super Mining Mechs and get 5 exclusive hats and 5 exclusive horn sounds!

Hats included:

  • Crown
  • Propeller cap
  • Astronaut helmet
  • Bunny ears
  • Stinky hat

Horns included:

  • Bicycle bell
  • Clown horn
  • Boat horn
  • Duck quack
  • Fart sound

Visit Lucy to equip your awesome hats and horns.

Thank you for supporting Super Mining Mechs!
-Barry .a.k.a. Delayed Victory


Important Note: By buying the Supporter Pack, you are first and foremost showing your support for Super Mining Mechs. The hats and horns are just a bonus on top!
